alert.note: Alert for Canadian; Kingfisher; Logan; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 4:18AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Gusty winds will impact portions of southeastern Kingfisher, Oklahoma, southern Logan and eastern Canadian Counties through 445 AM CDT... At 417 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking the leading edge of winds from strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cashion to 4 miles southwest of Piedmont to 4 miles southwest of El Reno. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oklahoma City, Edmond, Midwest City, Del City, El Reno, Guthrie, Yukon, Bethany, Mustang, Warr Acres, The Village, Piedmont, Spencer, Nichols Hills, Jones, Cashion, Arcadia, Forest Park, Woodlawn Park, and Lake Aluma. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 124 and 154. Interstate 40 between mile markers 122 and 154. Interstate 44 between mile markers 115 and 146. Interstate 240 between mile markers 1 and 2. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
